title: My client won't update

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
As title says, my league won't update. It stops at any random % and it pops up this message: "Update Failed - Unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information". And I've tried the following:

Click retry(few times)
Repair client
Delete my lol_air_client project folder
Reinstalling

Any other methods I can try to see if it fixs it?

replies.body: At this stage in the patcher, files are being downloaded and updated.  Your network may be having a trouble downloading these updates, which would result in this error.  As the issue would be caused by your connection, modifying game files wouldn't necessary fix this and might actually make things worse.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you so much! I downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool and repatched my game and it worked like a charm <3
